name: The Fuckening (alpha)
description:
• Left Mouse Button - Punch
  • Q - Ability
  • Space - Jump
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

The only buttons that work are: the "Endless" button; the difficulty buttons within; the restart button. To quit the game, hold down "Windows Key" and press "D". It should show you your desktop, and you can close the application from there.

In alpha stage for my TM. Not meant to be a full game.
